00027 #include "CPU.h"
00028 #include "Logs.h"
00029 
00030 #include "Display.h"
00031 #include "Memory.h"
00032 
00034 static unsigned short I;
00035 
00037 static unsigned char delay;
00038 
00040 static unsigned char sound;
00041 
00043 static unsigned char* registers;
00044 
00046 static unsigned short pc;
00047 
00049 static unsigned char sp;
00050 
00052 static unsigned short* stack;
00053 
00054 int setupCPU() {
00055     addEntry(LOW_LEVEL_OPERATION, "CPU initialization ...");
00056 
00057     I = delay = sound = sp = 0;
00058     pc = DATA_SPACE_START;
00059 
00060     registers = (unsigned char*)calloc(MAX_REGISTERS, sizeof(unsigned char));
00061     if(registers == NULL) return 1;
00062 
00063     stack = (unsigned char*)calloc(MAX_STACK_SIZE, sizeof(unsigned char));
00064     if(stack == NULL) return 1;
00065 
00066     addEntry(LOW_LEVEL_OPERATION, "CPU initialized.");
00067 
00068     return 0;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void cleanupCPU() {
00072     addEntry(LOW_LEVEL_OPERATION, "CPU  cleanup.");
00073 
00074     free(registers);
00075     free(stack);
00076 }
00077 
00082 inline static void opCLS() {
00083     clearScreen();
00084 }
00085 
00092 inline static void opRET() {
00093     addEntry(DISASSEMBLY, "RET");
00094     pc = stack[--sp];
00095 }
00096 
00104 inline static void opJP(unsigned short addr) {
00105     pc = addr - 2;
00106 }
00107 
00115 inline static void opJP(unsigned short nnn) {
00116     pc = nnn + v[0] - 2;
00117 }
00118 
00126 inline static void opCALL(unsigned short addr) {
00127     stack[sp++] = pc;
00128     pc = addr - 2;
00129 }
00130 
00138 inline static void opSE(unsigned char X, unsigned char kk) {
00139     if(registers[X] == kk) pc += 2;
00140 }
00141 
00149 inline static void opSE2(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00150     if(registers[X] == registers[Y]) pc += 2;
00151 }
00152 
00160 inline static void opSNE(unsigned char X, unsigned char kk) {
00161     if(registers[X] =! kk) pc += 2;
00162 }
00170 inline static void opSNE2(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00171     if(registers[X] != registers[Y]) pc += 2;
00172 }
00173 
00174 
00182 inline static void opMOV(unsigned char X, unsigned char kk) {
00183     registers[X] = kk;
00184 }
00185 
00193 inline static void opMOV2(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00194     registers[X] = registers[Y];
00195 }
00196 
00203 inline static void opMOVI(unsigned short nnn) {
00204     I = nnn;
00205 }
00206 
00213 inline static void opMOVFD(unsigned short X) {
00214     V[X] = delay;
00215 }
00216 
00223 inline static void opMOVD(unsigned short X) {
00224     delay = V[X];
00225 }
00226 
00233 inline static void opMOVS(unsigned short X) {
00234     sound = V[X];
00235 }
00236 
00244 inline static void opADD(unsigned char X, unsigned char kk) {
00245     registers[X] += kk;
00246 }
00247 
00248 
00257 inline static void opADD2(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00258     registers[0xF] = ((int)registers[X] + (int)registers[Y] > 255) ? 1 : 0;
00259     registers[X] += registers[Y];
00260 }
00261 
00270 inline static void opSUB(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00271     registers[0xF] = (registers[X] > registers[Y]) ? 1 : 0;
00272     registers[X] -= registers[Y];
00273 }
00274 
00283 inline static void opSUBN(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00284     registers[0xF] = (registers[Y] > registers[X]) ? 1 : 0;
00285     registers[X] = registers[Y] - registers[X];
00286 }
00287 
00296 inline static void opSHR(unsigned char X) {
00297     registers[0xF] = (registers[X] % 2);
00298     registers[X] >> 1;
00299 }
00300 
00309 inline static void opSHL(unsigned char X) {
00310     registers[0xF] = (registers[X] >= 128) ? 1 : 0;
00311     registers[X] << 1;
00312 }
00313 
00321 inline static void opOR(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00322     registers[X] |= registers[Y];
00323 }
00324 
00325 
00333 inline static void opAND(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00334     registers[X] &= registers[Y];
00335 }
00336 
00344 inline static void opXOR(unsigned char X, unsigned char Y) {
00345     registers[X] ^= registers[Y];
00346 }
00347 
00348 void tick() {
00349     // WHILE SMTH
00350     handleOpCode();
00351 }
00352 
00353 void handleOpCode() {
00354     unsigned short opCode;
00355     read(pc, 2, (char*)(&opCode));
00356     unsigned char byte1, byte2;
00357     byte1 = 0x01 & opCode;
00358     byte2 = 0x10 & opCode;
00359 
00360     if(opCode == 0x00E0) {
00361         opCLS();
00362     } else if(opCode == 0x00EE) {
00363         opRET();
00364     }
00365 
00366     else if(opCode & 0x1000 == 0x1000) {
00367         opJP(opCode & 0x0111);
00368     } else if(opCode & 0x1000 == 0x2000) {
00369         opCALL(opCode  & 0x0111);
00370     } else if(opCode & 0x1000 == 0x3000) {
00371         opSE(opCode & 0x0100, opCode & 0x0011);
00372     } else if(opCode & 0x1000 == 0x4000) {
00373         opSNE(opCode & 0x0100, opCode & 0x0011);
00374     } else if(opCode & 0x1001 == 0x5000) {
00375         opSE2(opCode & 0x0100, opCode & 0x0010);
00376     }
00377 
00378 
00379 }
